forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this morning will give way to cloudy skies and rain during the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this morning will give way to cloudy skies and rain during the afternoon. High near 60F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.
